trans-unit.source: Defines the interface for a random access iterator.
trans-unit.target: 定義隨機存取 Iterator 的介面。

trans-unit.source: Random access iterators support the following operations: moving forward one position by calling <c>operator++</c>, moving backward one position by calling <c>operator--</c>, accessing an element by using <c>operator[]</c>, and accessing an element by using pointer arithmetic.
trans-unit.target: 隨機存取迭代器支援下列作業：呼叫 <c>operator++</c> 往前移動一個位置、呼叫 <c>operator--</c> 往後移動一個位置、使用 <c>operator[]</c> 存取項目，以及使用指標算術存取項目。

trans-unit.source: A valid iterator that points to the same container as the current iterator.
trans-unit.target: 指向和目前 Iterator 同一個容器的有效 Iterator。

trans-unit.source: Determines the distance between the element that the current iterator is pointing to and the element that the given iterator is pointing to.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前的 Iterator 所指向的項目，以及指定的 Iterator 所指定項目之間的距離。

trans-unit.source: The distance, in number of elements, between the element that the current iterator is pointing to and the element that <paramref name="_Right" /> is pointing to.
trans-unit.target: 目前 Iterator 所指向的項目和 <paramref name="_Right" /> 所指向的項目之間的距離 (單位為項目的數目)。

trans-unit.source: This number is negative if <paramref name="_Right" /> points to an element that is before the element that the current iterator points to.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="_Right" /> 所指向的項目位於 Iterator 所指向的項目之前，這個數字便為負數。

trans-unit.source: A valid iterator that points to the same container as the current iterator.
trans-unit.target: 指向和目前 Iterator 同一個容器的有效 Iterator。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current iterator is pointing to an element in the container that precedes the element that the given iterator points to.
trans-unit.target: 判斷目前之 Iterator 指向的項目，是否在容器中位於指定之 Iterator 所指向的項目之前。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current iterator is pointing to an element that comes before the element that <paramref name="_Right" /> is pointing to; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前的 Iterator 所指向的項目，位於 <paramref name="_Right" /> 所指向的項目之前，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements to traverse.
To move the iterator forward, specify a positive number.
trans-unit.target: 若要將 Iterator 向前移動，請指定正數。

trans-unit.source: To move the iterator backward, use a negative number.
trans-unit.target: 若要將 Iterator 向後移動，請使用負數。

trans-unit.source: Moves the iterator by the given number of elements.
trans-unit.target: 按照指定的項目數目移動 Iterator。

trans-unit.source: The actual number of elements traversed.
This number will differ from <paramref name="_Offset" /> if the beginning or end of the container is reached before iterating the desired number of elements.
trans-unit.target: 如果在反覆查看想要的項目數之前就達到容器的開頭或結尾，則這個數字就不是 <paramref name="_Offset" />。
